mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectPayPgIntrlckLog Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ LOG_DT , LOG_TP_CD , LOG_CONT , PAY_NO , ORD_NO , CLM_NO , REPAIR_NO , MBR_NO , PG_APRV_NO FROM PAY_PG_INTRLCK_LOG WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deletePayPgIntrlckLog Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM PAY_PG_INTRLCK_LOG WHERE 1 = 1
